title: The Breach (Part 2)
body: I would love to do furthur research on this, but I don't think I can make it....I'm trying to comendeer one of the pods though, thankfully my Senior Researcher status does make it easier to do so. I'll guide the test subjects on what to do in order to survive, and conduct research about the dimension from the outside until I can get in. I don't know how long it will take though, but I do hope it will be soon. - Experiment Log 2
